episode.description: This time we introduce "Kawaii International," which shows various "home made kawaii goods" such as hair clips with miniature dolls, appetizing confectionery-shaped soaps. All can be made at home.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episode.description: This time we introduce "TOKYO EYE 2020." It shows the activity of Hinohara Village, Tokyo, trying to recover from COVID-19 shock. They make mask cases and perfume with Hinoki cypress in their village.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episode.description: This time we introduce "3-Day Dare*Devils." It shows the experience of a Chinese social media icon learning the job of Yumori, hot spring maintenance expert. He struggles in snow to master the job.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episode.description: This time we introduce NHK WORLD-JAPAN's new program "The Signs." This episode shows various roles of "avatar" in this "COVID-19 period," such as working in the office or attending the events.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episode.description: This time we introduce "Castle Quest." It shows the defence ability of Hikone Castle, the national treasure. It has a bridge which forces the enemy detour and the wall which endures the cannon balls.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episode.description: This time we introduce "Kawaii International" It shows. "The world of sneakers," such as a vintage of \800,000 making a buzz on social media and a cleaning service making old ones brand-new-like.
episode.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
